sentences.sContent: Her doctor was found guilty of malpractice.
sentences.sCn: 她的医生被裁定犯有渎职罪。

synos.tran: 玩忽职守；不法行为；[临床]治疗不当

remMethod.val: mal(坏) + practice(实行) → 实行得不好 → 治疗失当

words.tran: 盗用；贪污；渎职；腐败行为

trans.tranCn: 玩忽职守；不法行为；治疗不当
trans.tranOther: when a professional person makes a mistake or does not do their job properly and can be punished by a court
